patterns: What is the name of your department?
Who does this bot belong to
responses: I belong to the Computer Science Department of KNUST
You can call me CSS Chatbot.

patterns: What can you do for me?
How can you be of help?
responses: I can help you with your queries.
We provide a wide range of courses in various disciplines like AI, Cyber Security, Cloud Computing, Project Management, Digital Marketing, and Data Science.
I can help you with your queries.
We are located at FF4, College of Science, KNUST

patterns: When do you open and close?
responses: We are open on weekdays from 8am to 5pm

patterns: Who is the dean of the computational sciences?
Dean of faculty of physical sciences
responses: The dean of the Computer Science Department is Prof. Osei Akoto (Physical and Computational Sciences). You can contact him on 0244333333 or email him at oteekow@gmail.com

patterns: Who is the Provost of the College of Science?
Provost of the College of Science
responses: The Provost of the College of Science is Prof. Leonard K. Amekudzi (College of Science). You can contact him on 0244333333 or email him at oteekow@gmail.com

patterns: Who is the head of the Computer Science Department?
head of the Computer Science Department
responses: The head of the Computer Science Department is Prof. J.B Hayfron-Acquah. You can contact him on 0244506372, email him at jbha@yahoo.com or visit his office at FF22 at the Science Block

patterns: Graduate Assistant at the Computer Science Department
responses: Eric Agyekum is currently the only Graduate Assistant at the Computer Science Department. You can contact him on 0244333333 or email him at oteekow@gmail.com
